top.title: At least 44 dead and hundreds missing after fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
top.summary: Firefighters are struggling to put out the flames and say they are unsure when the blaze will be fully contained.

top.title: What we know about the Hong Kong apartment fires
top.summary: The death toll continues to rise and hundreds are missing, as firefighters struggle to put out the fire.

top.title: 'I am devastated': Hong Kong residents in disbelief after fire destroys blocks of flats
top.summary: Efforts to control the blaze are continuing as locals wait for news of missing loved ones.

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".

top.title: Ofcom vows to name and shame platforms over online sexism
top.summary: But critics say the regulator's new measures need to be the law rather than guidelines to make the internet safer for women and girls.

top.title: Cryptology firm cancels elections after losing encryption key
top.summary: The International Association for Cryptologic Research - created to study secure communication - said it was an "honest human mistake."
